alert.note: Alert for Midland (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 16 at 4:12AM EDT until June 16 at 5:15AM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 AM EDT FOR SOUTHERN BAY...SAGINAW AND SOUTHEASTERN MIDLAND COUNTIES... At 412 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Midland to near Laingsburg, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. These severe storms will be near... Midland and Auburn around 415 AM EDT. Bay City and Kawkawlin around 425 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by these severe thunderstorms include Brant, Nelson, Carrollton, Garfield, Arthur, Burt, Buena Vista Township, Gera, Layton Corners and Willard. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
